description.en:
A series created for the Honkai Impact 3rd Anniversary Event, the Summer Memories Arc lets readers take a closer look into the daily lives of St Freya's Valkyries as they enjoy the sights and sounds of the coastal city of Soukai, bathed in brilliant sunlight as wispy clouds scuddle across the azure sky. No matter whether it's Kiana consulting the great Bishop for culinary advice, or Himeko visiting the Yae Hospital to look for a magical love potion, there's never a dull moment in sight when the girls are serious about having fun!  


---

Main Story :   
[# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.org/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)   
[# Book 1006 = Anti-Enthrophy Invasion](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1007 = Gratitude Arc](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)

[# Book 1013 = Valkyries' Dining Escapades](https://mangadex.org/manga/26179/honkai-impact-3-valkyries-dining-escapades)  
**# Book 1014 = Summer Memories**
description.zh: 在街头徘徊的琪亚娜正在为打工而苦恼，阴差阳错之下她来到了吼姆欢乐餐厅，还通过了面试，然而意想不到的事还是发生了，并由此拉开了这个夏天的序幕…
